name: Super Star Trek (C64)
description:
I have taken the original source code of the 80 column terminal based game and converted it to run on a 40 column Commodore 64.

This program uses ZERO cursor control codes, just carriage returns, like the original terminal-based games of the 70s. No mainframe required!

There will likely be bugs, so please let me know.

Included in the disc image is a VERY modestly enhanced version with a few colours (where appropriate) and also a pure vanilla version.

PLEASE NOTE: This is a WIP and I will be adding more colour control codes throughout the game's many many screens, but ONLY where it's appropriate.
